comments: The value 2277401721110994662527249 is the base 2 home prime for 936 and occurs after 54 steps. The value 3690727229000499480592573891534356177653018575120050845976045596834749951228879 is the base 2 home prime for 1345 and occurs after 131 steps. The next term (home prime for 2295) contains at least 124 digits. Computation of further terms involves large factorizations. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Aug 04 2005
author: Michael B Greenwald (mbgreen(AT)central.cis.upenn.edu)
extensions: 2 more terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Aug 04 2005
